news.title: Democratic Rep. Gerry Connolly of Virginia dies after battling cancer
news.summary: Members of Congress pause their battle over President Donald Trump's massive tax bill to hold a moment of silence in Connolly's honor. Members of Congress paused their fight over President Trump'smassive tax bill.

news.title: Target cuts sales outlook as retailer blames tariff uncertainty and backlash to DEI rollback
news.summary: Target missed first-quarter sales estimates and said it was setting up a new office to try to accelerate its turnaround. Target missed first quarter sales estimates.

news.title: Sergey Brin points to where Google Glasses failed — and what Android XR gets right
news.summary: Google co-founder Sergey Brin says he's learned from his "mistakes" since the failed Google Glass launch in 2013. Brin: "I've learned from my mistakes"

news.title: A ‘fundamental regime shift’ could be underway as investors rethink U.S. assets, ECB says
news.summary: The central bank discussed the recent spike in market volatility. In its latest Financial Stability Review, the central bank discusses the recent rise in volatility.

news.title: Burger King targets families through movie partnerships in latest stage of turnaround
news.summary: The burger chain will sell new menu items inspired by the new "How to Train Your Dragon" movie. The menu items will be available at the chain's restaurants across the country.

news.title: Morgan Stanley turns bullish on U.S. stocks. Here’s why it says the market lows have already been made.
news.summary: Morgan Stanley sees a more ‘synchronous’ earnings recovery for the U.S. ahead, aided by in part by Fed rate cuts next year.

news.title: This is why Nvidia’s CEO thinks U.S. export controls on chips haven’t worked
news.summary: N Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang said U.S. export controls have only encouraged Chinese chip competitors. Huang said the controls have locked his company out of the market.

news.title: Tariff uncertainty, DEI backlash hurt Target’s results. CEO says price increases are ‘the very last resort.’
news.summary: Target says it saw softer-than-expected sales and profit pressures in the first quarter. Target says the retail environment remained “highly challenging.”

news.title: Hedge funds are shorting stocks again, boosting leverage to new record
news.summary: Hedge funds have increased bearish bets to a four-year high, according to Goldman Sachs. Goldman Sachs: Bearish bets have increased to a 4-year highs.

news.title: Lowe’s beats Wall Street’s profit expectations to one-up rival Home Depot
news.summary: Lowe’s said it faces housing-market headwinds and near-term economic uncertainty. But it kept its 2025 earnings projections in place.
